3.text: Stuff each core with 1 tbsp (14 g ) of butter and 2 tbsp (28 g) of brown sugar.

4.text: Put the apples in your baking dish and add 1 cup (240 mL) of hot water.

5.text: Sprinkle a layer of cinnamon over your apples, if you like.

6.text: Bake them for 30-45 minutes, until they’re browned.

7.text: Microwave them for 4 minutes on high heat for a quick alternative.

8.text: Remove your apples from the oven or microwave.

9.text: Let your apples cool for a few minutes.

10.text: Slice the apples to make them easier to serve.
